flake8-type-checking.option:
Type: Flake8TypeCheckingOptions/null
Status: DEPRECATED

Available Sub-options:
  - exempt-modules: Exempt certain modules from needing to be moved into type-checking
  - quote-annotations: Whether to add quotes around type annotations, if doing so would allow
  - runtime-evaluated-base-classes: Exempt classes that list any of the enumerated classes as a base class
  - runtime-evaluated-decorators: Exempt classes and functions decorated with any of the enumerated
  - strict: Enforce `TC001`, `TC002`, and `TC003` rules even when valid runtime imports
